arm_group.description: Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 8-9 x 10 -9 pmy  2x2  for 3 weeks

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of oral administration of probiotic
      Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG in middle ear and adenoid tonsil.

clinical_study.brief_title: Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG in the Middle Ear and Adenoid Tonsil

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  recurrent otitis media

          -  secretory otitis media

          -  chronic rhinitis

          -  recurrent sinusitis

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  significant illness

clinical_study.official_title: Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG in the Middle Ear and Adenoid Tonsil After Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Oral Administration

oversight_info.authority: Finland: National Institute for Health and Welfare

primary_outcome.measure: Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG in middle ear effusion and adenoid tonsil (cells/g)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor/Chief Physician at Hospital District of Helsinki and Uusimaa

collaborator.agency: National Institute for Health and Welfare, Finland

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Supportive Care
